# This rules come from the project gitignore.io. See :
# https://github.com/toptal/gitignore.io

#Microsemi Libero SOC v11.5

#ignore miscellaneous files in the following directories
simulation/*
package/*
component/*
tooldata/*
viewdraw/*

#auto-generated constraint log files
constraint/*
!constraint/**.sdc
!constraint/**.pdc

#synthesis log files
synthesis/*

#smartgen log files
smartgen/*/*
smartgen/smartgen.aws
!smartgen/*/*.gen
!smartgen/*/*.vhd
!smartgen/*/*.v

#designer files
designer/*/*
